scripts.start: concurrently -n "BACKEND,ML,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:ml" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'node.*server.js' && pkill -f nodemon && pkill -f vite && pkill -f 'python.*app.py' && lsof -ti:3000,5001,5002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
